protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: High affinity receptor for INSL5. Also acts as receptor for RLN3/relaxin-3, as well as bradykinin and kallidin. Binding of the ligand inhibit cAMP accumulation

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway

reference.reference_text: Liu C, Chen J, Sutton S, Roland B, Kuei C, Farmer N, Sillard R, Lovenberg TW: Identification of relaxin-3/INSL7 as a ligand for GPCR142. J Biol Chem. 2003 Dec 12;278(50):50765-70. Epub 2003 Sep 30.
